attributes.action: Ban Peter A Jordan from having any kids, have him hung or shot if he carries on.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The creator of the petition to ban motorcycles is a short sighted imbosile.
I'd like it to be made that he can not have any children as the country would really go down the pan, if he's got any they're taken away, if he puts another stupid petition up, he should be hung or shot for treason against the british people.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
